sections.transliteration: Asatyo Mahe Thi Prabhu Param Satye Tu Laee Ja
sections.translation: From the path of untruth, Lord take me to the ultimate truth

sections.transliteration: Oondaa Andhare Thi Prabhu Param Teje Tu Laee Ja
sections.translation: From the depth of darkness, Lord take me to the eternal light

sections.transliteration: Maha Mrutyu Manthi, Amrut Samipe Nath Laee Ja
sections.translation: From my mortal death, Lord take me to the ultimate peace

sections.transliteration: Tun Hino Hu Chhu To, Tunja Dareshana Dan Daee Da
sections.translation: If I do not have you within me, please bless me with your presence
